data.name: Modding tools for Cross Racing Championship Extreme
data.detailed_description:
These tools allow you to make your own addon cars, tracks and gamemodes for Cross Racing Championship.

PACKAGE CONTENTS


  • Plugins for 3ds max (Invictus shader, SCX export v4)
  • Scripts for 3ds max (SPL tools, pos/rotation tools, etc.)
  • Tutorials
  • Example gamemode sources
  • Example map
  • Resconvert for making .rpk files
  • Documentation files

These tools are provided as is, there's no official support for them. You need to have Cross Racing Championship Extreme in your Steam library for using the tools.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gerforce 2 MX 400 or ATI Radeon 8500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: Pentium IV 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 4200, 4600, 5600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
